msbt.message: This clown fish is a LOT faster than I expected. I wish I could swim like that, !
Each anchovy is a master of team coordination. Ever watch a school of 'em? I bet they rock at fish sports!
This sea butterfly may look like it's got wings, but they're actually legs Leg day must be brutal!
Did you know koi are actually super muscular? Must be all that swimming
Watching this guppy is so relaxing. Swim, little fish, swim!
This one's got some serious fighting spirit OK, fish! You betta show me what you got, !
When I hear "colorful fish," a surgeonfish is kinda what I think of, .
Stringfish are tough to catch since they can pull on a fishing line so hard. It's cool to see one here!
Check out that arapaima's tail fin! So super muscular, !
That hard stare I make the exact same expression as this Napoleonfish when I'm lifting, .
So how does this work? Like, does an ocean sunfish want sunlight, or does it light up the shade?
Wow! This whale shark looks super strong. That's some serious muscle!
Check out the gaze on that arowana. It's so determined! I bet it could take on the world, .
I see why they call the coelacanth a "living fossil." Every muscle's like a stone, !
That char has a gentle face, but it's movements look really angry. Be careful, !
Check out the teeth on that piranha. Definitely wouldn't want to be in the water with one, . Yikes!
Whoa. This great white shark's like one big muscle. I'm jealous!
This mahi-mahi's face is actually kinda charming in a fishy kind of way.
Could I use an oarfish for row exercises? Nah, too slippery.
Ever had sturgeon caviar? It's full of protein, plus it's so high in iron that every bite's like a bench press!
Wow! This fish looks like a toothy javelin!
How'd this hammerhead shark get such a flat head? Did it get stuck somewhere?
Wow! This creature's your donation? That's amazing! It's got some serious moves, .
